t: Unlocking innovation: three key themes from AWS re:Invent 2024 | AWS Messaging & Targeting Blog
s: January 23, 2025 - Amazon Web Services (AWS) re:Invent drew nearly 60,000 attendees from across the globe to Las Vegas, Nevada, December 2–6, 2024. The conference featured 5 keynotes, 18 innovation talks, and 2,300 sessions and hands-on labs offering immersive learning and networking opportunities.
